channel.title: How to get youtube videos on your iPod (a different way that works for me)
channel.description:
Ok this isnt online, but it actually works for me.
1. Plug your iPod in 2. Go to http://ares.mp3.es/ and dl Ares Tube 3. Launch Ares Tube 4. Use the browser in Ares tube to find a good video, once you got it, go to the link 5. Once you're at the video, on the far right side next to the space where you type the link, there should be a circle with a + in it. Click it. 6. In the bottom box, select the link you just added to the download list and click download on the right. 7. Once it's finished, click remove completed and do more!
Note: You can have more then one download in the download list at a time, just click the remove completed button so that you don't get confused which ones are done and which ones aren't ;)

item.title: How to get youtube videos on your iPod (a different way that works for me)
item.dc:creator: @sk8ter sk8ter
item.description:
@sk8ter wrote:

Ok this isnt online, but it actually works for me.

  1. Plug your iPod in
  2. Go to http://ares.mp3.es/ and dl Ares Tube
  3. Launch Ares Tube
  4. Use the browser in Ares tube to find a good video, once you got it, go to the link
  5. Once you’re at the video, on the far right side next to the space where you type the link, there should be a circle with a + in it. Click it.
  6. In the bottom box, select the link you just added to the download list and click download on the right.
  7. Once it’s finished, click remove completed and do more!

Note:
You can have more then one download in the download list at a time, just click the remove completed button so that you don’t get confused which ones are done and which ones aren’t
